docs.snippet: Two supervisors at a federal jail in Brooklyn accused of sexually abusing female inmates educated subordinates about the Prison Rape Elimination Act.

docs.snippet: The attack on lawmakers in Virginia was less an aberration than the latest example of a grim trend, widely remarked upon by leaders in both parties, but never slowed or stopped.

headline.print_headline: Words, but Little Action to Halt   Grim Cycle of Rage and Blame
headline.main: Shooting Is Latest Eruption in a Grim Ritual of Rage and Blame
